verses.text: A \w prayer|strong="H8605"\w* of \w Habakkuk|strong="H2265"\w* the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* upon \w Shigionoth|strong="H7692"\w*.\f + \fr 3.1 \ft upon…: or, according to variable songs, or, tunes, called in Hebrew, Shigionoth\f*

O 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, I have \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* thy \w speech|strong="H8088"\w*, \add and\add* was \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w*: O 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, \w revive|strong="H2421"\w* thy \w work|strong="H6467"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* of the \w years|strong="H8141"\w*, in the \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* of the \w years|strong="H8141"\w* make \w known|strong="H3045"\w*; in \w wrath|strong="H7267"\w* \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* \w mercy|strong="H7355"\w*.  +  r 3.2  t speech: Heb. report, or, hearing *  +  r 3.2  t revive: or, preserve alive *

\w God|strong="H0433"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* from \w Teman|strong="H8487"\w*, and the Holy \w One|strong="H6918"\w* from \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Paran|strong="H6290"\w*. \w Selah|strong="H5542"\w*. His \w glory|strong="H1935"\w* \w covered|strong="H3680"\w* the \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w*, and the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* was \w full|strong="H4390"\w* of his \w praise|strong="H8416"\w*.\f + \fr 3.3 \ft Teman: or, the south\f*

And \add his\add* \w brightness|strong="H5051"\w* was as the \w light|strong="H0216"\w*; he had \w horns|strong="H7161"\w* \add coming\add* out of his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*: and there \add was\add* the \w hiding|strong="H2253"\w* of his \w power|strong="H5797"\w*.\f + \fr 3.4 \ft horns…: or, bright beams out of his side\f*

\w Before|strong="H6440"\w* him \w went|strong="H3212"\w* the \w pestilence|strong="H1698"\w*, and burning \w coals|strong="H7565"\w* went \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* at his \w feet|strong="H7272"\w*.\f + \fr 3.5 \ft coals: or, diseases\f*

He \w stood|strong="H5975"\w*, and \w measured|strong="H4128"\w* the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*: he \w beheld|strong="H7200"\w*, and drove \w asunder|strong="H5425"\w* the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*; and the \w everlasting|strong="H5703"\w* \w mountains|strong="H2042"\w* were \w scattered|strong="H6327"\w*, the \w perpetual|strong="H5769"\w* \w hills|strong="H1389"\w* did \w bow|strong="H7817"\w*: his \w ways|strong="H1979"\w* \add are\add* \w everlasting|strong="H5769"\w*.

I \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* the \w tents|strong="H0168"\w* of \w Cushan|strong="H3572"\w* in \w affliction|strong="H0205"\w*: \add and\add* the \w curtains|strong="H3407"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Midian|strong="H4080"\w* did \w tremble|strong="H7264"\w*.\f + \fr 3.7 \ft Cushan: or, Ethiopia\f*\f + \fr 3.7 \ft in…: or, under affliction, or, vanity\f*

Was the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w displeased|strong="H2734"\w* against the \w rivers|strong="H5104"\w*? \add was\add* thine \w anger|strong="H0639"\w* against the \w rivers|strong="H5104"\w*? \add was\add* thy \w wrath|strong="H5678"\w* against the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, that thou didst \w ride|strong="H7392"\w* upon thine \w horses|strong="H5483"\w* \add and\add* thy \w chariots|strong="H4818"\w* of \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w*?\f + \fr 3.8 \ft of…: or, were salvation?\f*

Thy \w bow|strong="H7198"\w* was made \w quite|strong="H6181"\w* \w naked|strong="H5783"\w*, \add according\add* to the \w oaths|strong="H7621"\w* of the \w tribes|strong="H4294"\w*, \add even thy\add* \w word|strong="H0562"\w*. \w Selah|strong="H5542"\w*. Thou didst \w cleave|strong="H1234"\w* the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* with \w rivers|strong="H5104"\w*.\f + \fr 3.9 \ft earth…: or, rivers of the earth\f*

The \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* thee, \add and\add* they \w trembled|strong="H2342"\w*: the \w overflowing|strong="H2230"\w* of the \w water|strong="H4325"\w* passed \w by|strong="H5674"\w*: the \w deep|strong="H8415"\w* \w uttered|strong="H5414"\w* his \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*, \add and\add* lifted \w up|strong="H5375"\w* his \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* on \w high|strong="H7315"\w*.

The \w sun|strong="H8121"\w* \add and\add* \w moon|strong="H3394"\w* stood \w still|strong="H5975"\w* in their \w habitation|strong="H2073"\w*: at the \w light|strong="H0216"\w* of thine \w arrows|strong="H2671"\w* they \w went|strong="H1980"\w*, \add and\add* at the \w shining|strong="H5051"\w* of thy \w glittering|strong="H1300"\w* \w spear|strong="H2595"\w*.\f + \fr 3.11 \ft at the light…: or, thine arrows walked in the light\f*

Thou didst march \w through|strong="H6805"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* in \w indignation|strong="H2195"\w*, thou didst \w thresh|strong="H1758"\w* the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w* in \w anger|strong="H0639"\w*.

Thou wentest \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* for the \w salvation|strong="H3468"\w* of thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \add even\add* for \w salvation|strong="H3468"\w* with thine \w anointed|strong="H4899"\w*; thou \w woundedst|strong="H4272"\w* the \w head|strong="H7218"\w* out of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*, by \w discovering|strong="H6168"\w* the \w foundation|strong="H3247"\w* unto the \w neck|strong="H6677"\w*. \w Selah|strong="H5542"\w*.\f + \fr 3.13 \ft by…: Heb. making naked\f*

Thou didst strike \w through|strong="H5344"\w* with his \w staves|strong="H4294"\w* the \w head|strong="H7218"\w* of his \w villages|strong="H6518"\w*: they came out as a \w whirlwind|strong="H5590"\w* to \w scatter|strong="H6327"\w* me: their \w rejoicing|strong="H5951"\w* \add was\add* as to \w devour|strong="H0398"\w* the \w poor|strong="H6041"\w* \w secretly|strong="H4565"\w*.\f + \fr 3.14 \ft came…: Heb. were tempestuous\f*

Thou didst \w walk|strong="H1869"\w* through the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* with thine \w horses|strong="H5483"\w*, \add through\add* the \w heap|strong="H2563"\w* of \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*.\f + \fr 3.15 \ft heap: or, mud\f*

When I \w heard|strong="H8085"\w*, my \w belly|strong="H0990"\w* \w trembled|strong="H7264"\w*; my \w lips|strong="H8193"\w* \w quivered|strong="H6750"\w* at the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*: \w rottenness|strong="H7538"\w* \w entered|strong="H0935"\w* into my \w bones|strong="H6106"\w*, and I \w trembled|strong="H7264"\w* in myself, that I might \w rest|strong="H5117"\w* in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of \w trouble|strong="H6869"\w*: when he cometh \w up|strong="H5927"\w* unto the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, he will invade them with his \w troops|strong="H1464"\w*.\f + \fr 3.16 \ft invade…: or, cut them in pieces\f*

¶ Although the fig \w tree|strong="H8384"\w* shall not \w blossom|strong="H6524"\w*, neither \add shall\add* \w fruit|strong="H2981"\w* \add be\add* in the \w vines|strong="H1612"\w*; the \w labour|strong="H4639"\w* of the \w olive|strong="H2132"\w* shall \w fail|strong="H3584"\w*, and the \w fields|strong="H7709"\w* shall \w yield|strong="H6213"\w* no \w meat|strong="H0400"\w*; the \w flock|strong="H6629"\w* shall be cut \w off|strong="H1504"\w* from the \w fold|strong="H4356"\w*, and \add there shall be\add* no \w herd|strong="H1241"\w* in the \w stalls|strong="H7517"\w*:\f + \fr 3.17 \ft fail: Heb. lie\f*
Yet I will \w rejoice|strong="H5937"\w* in the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, I will \w joy|strong="H1523"\w* in the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of my \w salvation|strong="H3468"\w*.

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0136"\w* \add is\add* my \w strength|strong="H2428"\w*, and he will \w make|strong="H7760"\w* my \w feet|strong="H7272"\w* like \w hinds’|strong="H0355"\w* \add feet\add*, and he will make me to \w walk|strong="H1869"\w* upon mine high \w places|strong="H1116"\w*. To the chief \w singer|strong="H5329"\w* on my stringed \w instruments|strong="H5058"\w*.\f + \fr 3.19 \ft chief…: or, overseer\f*\f + \fr 3.19 \ft stringed…: Heb. Neginoth\f*
